ingredients.ingredient: 2 large russet potatoes - peeled, and sliced into 1/4 inch strips

cookingTips: Soak cut potatoes in sugar water to prevent browning and enhance flavor
Use a two-stage frying method: first at 325°F to cook through, then at 375°F for crispiness
Drain thoroughly on paper towels and season immediately while hot
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why does this recipe call for soaking potatoes in sugar water, and what's the advantage of the two-temperature frying method?
